content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":200082,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に心臓が止まるかと思った……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I really thought my heart was going to stop...\""},{"lineNumber":200083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「母さん、一つ勘違いしてるが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mom, you’re misunderstanding one thing...\""},{"lineNumber":200084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺ぁ、別にこいつらが来なくても","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was willing to go even if these guys didn’t come\""},{"lineNumber":200085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一人でも行く気だったぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was determined to go alone.\""},{"lineNumber":200086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?\""},{"lineNumber":200087,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺は一度負けたんだぞ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I lost once, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":200088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なら、今度は一人で戦って、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So this time, I have to fight alone,\""},{"lineNumber":200089,"originalJapaneseLine":"　圧倒的に完璧に勝つしかねぇだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"and overwhelmingly win perfectly.\""},{"lineNumber":200090,"originalJapaneseLine":"「母さん、あんたが俺を、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mom, it’s you who raised me,\""},{"lineNumber":200091,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう育ててくれたんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"to be that way.\""},{"lineNumber":200092,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そん、なぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-that’s...\""},{"lineNumber":200093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And besides...\""},{"lineNumber":200094,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の国と、俺の身内を守る為には、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To protect my country and my family,\""},{"lineNumber":200095,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの糞親父を倒さねぇといけねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I have to defeat that damn old man.\""},{"lineNumber":200096,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、戦うだけだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, I’ll just fight.\""},{"lineNumber":200097,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なあ、そうだろ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right?\""},{"lineNumber":200098,"originalJapaneseLine":"ザンスに促されて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Encouraged by Zansu,"},{"lineNumber":200099,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはこくこくと頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"you nodded slowly."},{"lineNumber":200100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、う、う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-u-u...\""},{"lineNumber":200101,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、駄目駄目ー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But no, absolutely no!\""},{"lineNumber":200102,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リアは絶対の絶対に反対なんだからー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ria is absolutely, definitely against it!\""},{"lineNumber":200103,"originalJapaneseLine":"「参ったな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m at a loss...\""},{"lineNumber":200104,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあまあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, now,\""},{"lineNumber":200105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいじゃないですか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn’t it okay?"},{"lineNumber":200106,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう一度この子達を信じてみましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s believe in these kids once more.\""},{"lineNumber":200107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、クルックーさん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Kurukku-san!\""},{"lineNumber":200108,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで影からわき出たように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if emerging from the shadows,"},{"lineNumber":200109,"originalJapaneseLine":"音もなくクルックーが現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukku appeared soundlessly."},{"lineNumber":200110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あんた……いたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-you... you were here?\""},{"lineNumber":200111,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、気配を消して、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, I erased my presence,"},{"lineNumber":200112,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実はずっと部屋の隅にいました」","translatedEnglishLine":"and I was actually in the corner of the room all along.\""},{"lineNumber":200113,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんなのこの人……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-who is this person...?\""},{"lineNumber":200114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞ちゃんのお母さんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She’s <Eiru>’s mother.\""},{"lineNumber":200115,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この人が噂の！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this the person we’ve heard about!?\""},{"lineNumber":200116,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Eiru>...\""},{"lineNumber":200117,"originalJapaneseLine":"母があなたの目の前に立ち、","translatedEnglishLine":"Your mother stood right in front of you,"},{"lineNumber":200118,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの顔を見つめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"and stared at your face."},{"lineNumber":200119,"originalJapaneseLine":"その母の顔が柔和に微笑んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Her face softened into a gentle smile."},{"lineNumber":200120,"originalJapaneseLine":"「成長しましたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’ve grown...\""},{"lineNumber":200121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あなたは理由を持って、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You have a reason,"},{"lineNumber":200122,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦うことを自ら選んでくれた」","translatedEnglishLine":"and chose to fight on your own accord.\""},{"lineNumber":200123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのことが私は嬉しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That makes me very happy.\""},{"lineNumber":200124,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":200125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……これだと語弊がありますね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Using those words might be misleading.\""},{"lineNumber":200126,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’re right...\""},{"lineNumber":200127,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こう、言い直しましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let me say it this way.\""},{"lineNumber":200128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう思えるように育ったあなたの母になれて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’m proud to be the mother of someone who grew up to think that way,"},{"lineNumber":200129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はそれがとても誇らしい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I truly am.\""},{"lineNumber":200130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞、あなたの好きなようになさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Eiru>, do as you like.\""},{"lineNumber":200131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫、文句を言う方は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don’t worry, anyone who complains,"},{"lineNumber":200132,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が黙らせますよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will silence them.\""},{"lineNumber":200133,"originalJapaneseLine":"びゅんびゅん。","translatedEnglishLine":"*Whoosh whoosh.*"},{"lineNumber":200134,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーは手で空を斬った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kurukku sliced the air with her hand."},{"lineNumber":200135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「黙らせるって手刀で！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Silence them with a karate chop!?\""},{"lineNumber":200136,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もちろん冗談です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course, I’m joking.\""},{"lineNumber":200137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":200138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「変な人だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What a strange person...\""},{"lineNumber":200139,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方達は負けた直後であろうと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even though you just lost,"},{"lineNumber":200140,"originalJapaneseLine":"　引くことよりも戦うことを選んだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"you chose to fight rather than retreat...\""},{"lineNumber":200141,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当に皆さん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Truly, all of you...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に心臓が止まるかと思った……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I really thought my heart was going to stop..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「母さん、一つ勘違いしてるが……」
「俺ぁ、別にこいつらが来なくても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was willing to go even if these guys didn’t come"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人でも行く気だったぞ」
なら、今度は一人で戦って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So this time, I have to fight alone,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的に完璧に勝つしかねぇだろう」
そう育ててくれたんだ」
俺の国と、俺の身内を守る為には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To protect my country and my family,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの糞親父を倒さねぇといけねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have to defeat that damn old man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたはこくこくと頷いた。
リアは絶対の絶対に反対なんだからー！」
もう一度この子達を信じてみましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s believe in these kids once more."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで影からわき出たように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if emerging from the shadows,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 音もなくクルックーが現れた。
実はずっと部屋の隅にいました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I was actually in the corner of the room all along."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞ちゃんのお母さんだよ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this the person we’ve heard about!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母があなたの目の前に立ち、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your mother stood right in front of you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの顔を見つめる。
その母の顔が柔和に微笑んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her face softened into a gentle smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うことを自ら選んでくれた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and chose to fight on your own accord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……これだと語弊がありますね」
こう、言い直しましょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let me say it this way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう思えるように育ったあなたの母になれて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’m proud to be the mother of someone who grew up to think that way,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はそれがとても誇らしい」
「＜エール＞、あなたの好きなようになさい」
クルックーは手で空を斬った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku sliced the air with her hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方達は負けた直後であろうと、
引くことよりも戦うことを選んだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you chose to fight rather than retreat..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
